name: Happy Match Blossom Color
description:
Happy Match Blossom Color is a very addictive match 3 game! Crush the flower by your finger, and enjoy blossom blast!
This match-3 game is also a brand new amazing casual game, completely free!! There are many crazy puzzles that are created from beautiful flowers. Objectives differ in over many levels.
Gameplay is absolutely simple to suit everyone's taste. Just swap and match 3 or more same flowers to eliminate them, try to make more combos as you can. It's simple, but once you play, you will find it very challenge.
Features
- Fantastic wonderland for beautiful journey
- 100+ well-designed levels
- Tasty juicy graphics
- Visual and sounds effects
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
